faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ZOOM EARTH AI

items.question: What is ZOOM EARTH AI?
items.answer: ZOOM EARTH AI is an advanced AI-powered tool that creates stunning cinematic zoom-out sequences from your photos. It transforms any image into a dramatic video that zooms from ground level to space, showing the Earth from a satellite perspective.

items.question: How does the AI technology work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your uploaded photo to identify the location and creates a seamless zoom-out sequence using satellite imagery and advanced computer vision. The process combines multiple data sources to generate smooth, realistic transitions.

items.question: How long does it take to process a video?
items.answer: Most videos are processed within 30-60 seconds, depending on the complexity and desired output quality. Our AI infrastructure is optimized for speed without compromising quality.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support all major image formats including JPEG, PNG, WebP, and HEIC. For best results, we recommend high-resolution images (at least 1080p) with clear geographical features.

items.question: What's the output video quality?
items.answer: Our AI generates videos in up to 4K resolution (3840x2160) at 30fps. You can choose from multiple quality options including 1080p, 2K, and 4K based on your needs.

items.question: Can I use the videos commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All videos created with ZOOM EARTH AI come with full commercial usage rights. You can use them in your marketing campaigns, social media content, presentations, and more without any restrictions.
